comments.text: There's currently no way to search the GeoIP database from the admin UI.  Trying to find an existing IP block requires paging through 1100 pages of netblocks.  I'd like to be able to enter an IP address and be taken to the block which contains it.
comments.raw_text: There's currently no way to search the GeoIP database from the admin UI.  Trying to find an existing IP block requires paging through 1100 pages of netblocks.  I'd like to be able to enter an IP address and be taken to the block which contains it.

comments.raw_text: Anthony, can you investigate how hard this would be in Django's admin tools? Do they allow for custom searches?
